name: Shannon Framework v4
short_description: Enterprise-grade specification-driven development with skill-based orchestration
long_description: Shannon Framework v4 transforms complex software projects into manageable, validated phases using skill-based architecture, progressive disclosure, and zero-context-loss wave orchestration. Features 8D complexity analysis, 5-phase planning, real testing (NO MOCKS), confidence checking, and meta-programming capabilities.
author: Shannon Framework Team
install_instructions:
# Shannon Framework v4 Installation

## Prerequisites

### Required MCP Server (Tier 1)
```bash
# Serena MCP - Context preservation and memory
npx @modelcontextprotocol/create-server serena
```

### Recommended MCP Servers (Tier 2)
```bash
# Sequential Thinking - Multi-step reasoning
npm install -g @modelcontextprotocol/server-sequential

# Puppeteer - Real browser testing
npm install -g @modelcontextprotocol/server-puppeteer
```

## Plugin Installation

```bash
# Add marketplace (if using local development)
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/shannon-framework

# Install plugin
/plugin install shannon-v4@shannon-framework

# Restart Claude Code
```

## Verification

```bash
# Check Shannon status
/sh_status

# Run quick start
/sh_quickstart
```

## First Specification

```bash
/sh_spec "Build a React dashboard with real-time charts and user authentication"
```

Shannon will analyze complexity, recommend appropriate skills and MCPs, and create a detailed implementation plan.
changelog:
# Shannon v4.0.0 Changelog

## üöÄ Major Features

### Skill-Based Architecture
- **Progressive Disclosure**: 60-80% token reduction (50K ‚Üí 5K base)
- **25 Domain-Specific Skills**: Auto-generated from spec analysis
- **Meta-Programming**: Skills that write skills
- **TDD Validation**: RED/GREEN/REFACTOR methodology

### Enhanced Orchestration
- **PreWave Hook**: Dependency validation, context injection
- **PostWave Hook**: Result collection, state updates
- **QualityGate Hook**: 5-gate validation system
- **Automated Context Loading**: Reduces manual protocol overhead

### MCP Integration Tiers
- **Tier 1 (Mandatory)**: Serena - Context preservation
- **Tier 2 (Recommended)**: Sequential, Context7, Puppeteer
- **Tier 3 (Project-Specific)**: shadcn-ui, Xcode, AWS, etc.

### System Prompt Hierarchy
- User CLAUDE.md ‚Üí Project CLAUDE.md ‚Üí Plugin prompts ‚Üí Skills
- Skills favored over general prompts based on context
- Seamless integration with existing CLAUDE.md files

## ‚ú® Improvements from v3

- **Token Efficiency**: 60-80% reduction in context usage
- **Faster Wave Execution**: Automated context injection
- **Better Skill Discovery**: Spec-driven skill recommendations
- **Enhanced Testing**: Framework-specific validation
- **Cross-Session Learning**: Reflexion pattern for error learning

## üîß Breaking Changes

- Plugin name changed from `shannon` to `shannon-v4`
- Commands now link to skills (progressive activation)
- Agents use lightweight frontmatter (resources in subdirectories)
- Hook system enhanced (3 new hooks)

## üìö Migration from v3

See MIGRATION_V3_TO_V4.md for detailed migration guide.

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed context loss during auto-compaction (PreCompact enhanced)
- Resolved wave dependency race conditions (PreWave validation)
- Improved MCP server detection (graceful degradation)

## üôè Acknowledgments

Inspired by research into:
- Anthropic's Skills SDK
- Superpowers Framework (TDD methodology)
- SuperClaude (confidence checking)
- Humbl Skills (SITREP protocol)

features.title: 8D Complexity Analysis
features.description: Analyzes projects across 8 dimensions (Structural, Cognitive, Coordination, Temporal, Technical, Scale, Uncertainty, Dependency) to generate accurate effort estimates and risk assessments

features.title: Skill-Based Orchestration
features.description: 25 domain-specific skills auto-generated from spec analysis. Skills for React, Next.js, Express, PostgreSQL, iOS, Android, Docker, AWS, and more

features.title: Progressive Disclosure
features.description: Loads only metadata (~5K tokens) at session start, pulling full content on-demand. Achieves 60-80% token reduction vs v3

features.title: Zero-Context-Loss Waves
features.description: PreCompact hook saves state to Serena MCP before auto-compaction. SessionStart restores context automatically. Never lose project state

features.title: 5-Phase Planning
features.description: Discovery (20%) ‚Üí Architecture (15%) ‚Üí Implementation (45%) ‚Üí Testing (15%) ‚Üí Deployment (5%). Proven effort distribution

features.title: Wave Orchestration
features.description: Parallel execution of independent tasks. ONE message multi-Task invocation achieves true parallelism. Measured 2-4√ó speedup

features.title: NO MOCKS Testing
features.description: Functional testing only - real browsers (Puppeteer), real databases, real HTTP requests. Tests production behavior

features.title: Confidence Checking
features.description: Pre-implementation validation (5 checks: no duplicates, architecture compliance, official docs, OSS reference, root cause). Score ‚â•90% to proceed

features.title: Meta-Programming
features.description: shannon-skill-generator creates project-specific skills automatically. Spec-driven template selection and context injection

features.title: MCP Integration Tiers
features.description: Tier 1 (Mandatory): Serena. Tier 2 (Recommended): Sequential, Context7, Puppeteer. Tier 3 (Project-Specific): Framework MCPs

features.title: Quality Gates
features.description: 5-gate validation: Specification, Phase, Wave, Quality, Project. Functional tests only, no user approval burden

features.title: Reflexion Learning
